item.title: Target Plans to Have Midnight Sales at 500 Stores to Sell Taylor Swift’s ‘Life of a Showgirl’ Album
item.description: Which century is this? Midnight openings for stores to sell hot new album releases at the moment they’re allowed to go on sale are largely an artifact of the ’80s and ’90s, before st
